ISSUE.TITLE: Support LFS
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: Hello Team, Gitness local setup is very smooth. I have few questions: 1. How should I use S3 in Fitness to store the git repository to save on storage cost? 2. To manage LFS files does Gitness have any integration with Git-LFS or DVC? Thanks!
